channel.title: Games on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Games on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Breakout
item.description: Breakout Play Breakout Controls Move Left - Left/A key Move Right - Right/D key More Info Similar to Pong, this is a single player game where you shoot the ball to try and break all the blocks. Start with 3 lives and you lose a life if you miss the ball. Custom Editor One very powerful feature of Godot is their collection of prebuilt UI elements. This makes it quick and easy to build a level editor program that works specifically for my level format (Fun Fact: This is why the Godot editor itself runs on the Godot engine.

item.title: Pong
item.description: Pong Play Pong Controls Move Paddle Up - Up/W key Move Paddle Down - Down/S key More Info A simple single player paddle game, based on the early Pong games in the 1970s. Move your paddle up or down to return the ball to the AI opponent, aim to shoot the ball past the opponent's paddle, first to 10 points wins. My first experience using Godot This was the first game I developed using Godot.
